casebody.data:
No. 10-7585. Robby Keith Pope, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 562 U.S. 1187, 131 S. Ct. 1015,

178 L. Ed. 2d 843,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 755. January 18, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
